languages.text: Вокс-тишину прерывает хрипящий голос. Сквозь страшные помехи он умоляет любого, кто его слышит, "забрать нас с этой проклятой посудины, пусть даже и в объятия смерти".
A hoarse voice breaks the vox-silence. Through the terrible noise of static, it implores anyone who hears it to "take us from this bloody rustbucket, even if it's into death's embrace."
languages.original_text: Вокс-тишину прерывает хрипящий голос. Сквозь страшные помехи он умоляет любого, кто его слышит, "забрать нас с этой проклятой посудины, пусть даже и в объятия смерти".

traits.locale_text: A hoarse voice breaks the vox silence. Through terrible static noise, it implores anyone who hears it to "take us from this bloody rustbucket, even if it's into death's embrace."

A hoarse voice breaks the vox-silence. Through the terrible noise of static, it implores anyone who hears it to "take us from this bloody rustbucket, even if it's into death's embrace."

languages.text: Eine heisere Stimme durchbricht die Vox-Stille. Durch ein schreckliches Rauschen fleht die Stimme den Zuhörer an, "uns von diesem verfluchten Rostkübel zu holen, notfalls in die Umarmung des Todes".
languages.original_text: A hoarse voice breaks the vox-silence. Through the terrible noise of static, it implores anyone who hears it to "take us from this bloody rustbucket, even if it's into death's embrace."

traits.locale_text: Eine heisere Stimme durchbricht die Vox-Stille. Durch ein schreckliches Rauschen fleht die Stimme den Zuhörer an, "uns von diesem verfluchten Rostkübel zu holen, notfalls in die Umarmung des Todes".

languages.text: Une voix rauque brise le silence. À travers de terribles grésillements, l'homme à l'autre bout du vox supplie quiconque l'entend de « nous libérer de ce maudit tas de ferraille, même si c'est en nous tuant ».
languages.original_text: A hoarse voice breaks the vox-silence. Through the terrible noise of static, it implores anyone who hears it to "take us from this bloody rustbucket, even if it's into death's embrace."

traits.locale_text: Une voix rauque brise le silence. À travers de terribles grésillements, l'homme à l'autre bout du vox supplie quiconque l'entend de « nous libérer de ce maudit tas de ferraille, même si c'est en nous tuant ».

languages.text: かすれた声がヴォックスの沈黙を破った。ひどい雑音の中から、その声は聞く者すべてに懇願した。「この血まみれのポンコツ船から連れ出してくれ。たとえ死の抱擁の中でもいいから」
languages.original_text: A hoarse voice breaks the vox-silence. Through the terrible noise of static, it implores anyone who hears it to "take us from this bloody rustbucket, even if it's into death's embrace."

traits.locale_text: かすれた声がヴォックスの沈黙を破った。ひどい雑音の中から、その声は聞く者すべてに懇願した。「この血まみれのポンコツ船から連れ出してくれ。たとえ死の抱擁の中でもいいから」

languages.text: Una voz ronca rompe el silencio de voco. A través de la espantosa estática, ruega a cualquiera que la escuche que «nos saque de esta maldita bañera oxidada, aunque sea enviándonos a la muerte».
languages.original_text: A hoarse voice breaks the vox-silence. Through the terrible noise of static, it implores anyone who hears it to "take us from this bloody rustbucket, even if it's into death's embrace."

traits.locale_text: Una voz ronca rompe el silencio de voco. A través de la espantosa estática, ruega a cualquiera que la escuche que «nos saque de esta maldita bañera oxidada, aunque sea enviándonos a la muerte».

languages.text: 音阵装置里传来了沙哑的声音。尽管静电噪音很严重，但你还是听到了对方的恳求——“把我们从这该死的锈铁桶里带出去吧，就算是死了也好。”
languages.original_text: A hoarse voice breaks the vox-silence. Through the terrible noise of static, it implores anyone who hears it to "take us from this bloody rustbucket, even if it's into death's embrace."

traits.locale_text: 音阵装置里传来了沙哑的声音。尽管静电噪音很严重，但你还是听到了对方的恳求——“把我们从这该死的锈铁桶里带出去吧，就算是死了也好。”

languages.text: Boğuk bir ses, voks sessizliğini bozuyor. Dehşet verici statik gürültüsü eşliğinde "Bizi bu lanet hurdadan kurtarın, ölüm dahi olsa razıyız." diye yalvarışı zar zor anlaşılıyor.
languages.original_text: A hoarse voice breaks the vox-silence. Through the terrible noise of static, it implores anyone who hears it to "take us from this bloody rustbucket, even if it's into death's embrace."
